description: The Giant Bomb staff discuss the latest video game news and new releases, taste-test questionable beverages, and get wildly off-topic in this weekly podcast.
title: Giant Bombcast

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 660: They're Only Stems!
episodes.description: The next generation is (mostly) here, so we finally dig deep into what is and isn't ready to go on the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X, plus hands-on with Bugsnax and Fuser, thoughts on the future of Mass Effect, a bunch of your next-gen questions answere

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Bombcast Bonus! The HotSpot 386
episodes.description: Get a taste of the most blazingest podcast in the world as Brad Shoemaker, Alex Navarro, Jeff Gerstmann, and Your HostMaster Vinny Caravella talk about the PlayStation 5 and the Xbox Series X.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 659: ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ
episodes.description: This week: our first thoughts on the Xbox Series X and S, the magical destruction of Teardown, the breakneck cyber-parkour of Ghostrunner, more time with Watch Dogs: Legion, looking back on the big overnight game launches of yore, Sony throws cold water o

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 658: Geometry Wars 99
episodes.description: The PlayStation 5 is here, and we're also here to talk about the DualSense controller and Cooling Springs in Astro's Playroom, along with Watch Dogs Legion, Immortals Fenyx Rising, our wishlist for next-gen Geometry Wars, the Uncharted movie cast, and the

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 657: The Content
episodes.description: With new consoles drawing nigh, we spend way too much time talking about the Series X launch lineup and the PS5's new hint system, plus Mario Kart Live, Phasmophobia, the end of Hades, the (different kind of) end of StarCraft II, and the eventual fate of

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 656: Throw Up Your Bungers
episodes.description: Genshin Impact makes a big impact this week, as does Bugsnax. PS4 games on PS5 get detailed, Crucible gets the axe. Milla Jovovich loves Meowscular Chef. Rambo is in MK11. It's a Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 655: X Gon' Confirm It For Ya
episodes.description: Star Wars: Squadrons! Genshin Impact! Hades! The Oculus Quest 2! The PlayStation 5's mysterious nut! The contentious subject of Xs and Os! The biggest a-hole in video games! What WON'T you hear about on this podcast?!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 654: Vault of Ass
episodes.description: We're pretty taken with Hades and Spelunky 2 here, not so much WWE Battlegrounds or Serious Sam 4. Next-gen console news! A live sideshow! Mario except what if he was food! Tune in!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 653: That's Hot Soup!
episodes.description: Between the Bethesda acquisition, PlayStation 5 pricing, and our budding Vtuber careers, there's a LOT to talk about this week, along with Mario 3D All-Stars, WWE Battlegrounds, the final version of Hades, quarantine bathing habits, and more breakfast cer

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 652: Gods and Monster Energy
episodes.description: Spelunky 2! Spelunky 2. But also: Fuser, the Among Us craze, Wasteland 3, Matt Rorie, the latest Ubisoft Forward, next-gen console rumors and scuttlebutt, ketchup cakes, giant grapes, and an impromptu ranking of Zeldas.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 651: Luda Shoota
episodes.description: The Xbox Series S leak and Mario 35th games are the big news this week, but we also find time for the release version of Avengers, Tony Hawk 1+2, Spellbreaker, the anime toggle, a world without shoes, and the Mountain Dew of oranges.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 650: Strange Times!
episodes.description: This week we plow through a mountain of news about PS5 release dates, new GeForce cards, Avengers cosmetics and Mario remasters, chat about New World and Captain Tsubasa, get serious about AMVs, and wonder where all the orange meringue pies are.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 649: Courtnite
episodes.description: Alex Navarro joins us from NYC to talk Madden 21, Outriders, Mortal Shell, Spiritfarer, Rogue Legacy 2, next year's new Switch, the DC FANDOME, the latest on Apple v. Epic, and rollicking debates on foods like mustard, soda, and, uh, Vicks VapoRub?

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 648: jeffminter.txt
episodes.description: This week: the Tony Hawk remake demo, Risk of Rain 2's final form, that Moose Life, the Apple vs. Epic dust-up, next-gen console pricing, the mysterious fate of the Rock-afire Explosion, and a very intensive rumination on gunblades.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 647: The Historical Gamer Strikes Again!
episodes.description: If you're looking for LIVE REAX to the breaking Halo Infinite delay, impressions of the Avengers beta, and expectations for Rocksteady's Suicide Squad game and the Remedy Connected Universe, this is the Bombcast for you!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 646: Great Tile Feel
episodes.description: Caty McCarthy from USgamer joins us to chat about the mystery that is Blaseball, the madcap action of Fall Guys, free-to-play Halo Infinite, Frog Fractions 3 through 9, PS5 gadget compatibility, the horror of carpeted bathrooms, and... the assembled guest

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 645: Evidence of Luigi
episodes.description: As July comes to a close we recap Microsoft's latest Xbox Series X Event, continued adventures in Ghost of Tsushima, catching rare monsters in Pokemon Go Fest 2020, dipping stuff in other stuff, leaks at Nintendo, G4 coming back, and the long awaited sequ

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 644: WarioWare Without the Wario
episodes.description: Tamoor Hussain pops over from GameSpot to talk samurai photography, the new Paper Mario, the current whereabouts of Francis York Morgan, the latest goings-on with next-gen consoles, the great charge-move controversy, and stealing booze from monkeys.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 643: Save the Truck for Last
episodes.description: Ghost of Tsushima leads this week's show, along with Devolverland's not-E3, the latest Superhot, Ubisoft's Forward event and ongoing internal turmoil, Sony's Epic investment, the most expensive Mario ever sold, NEC's anime console, and Ice Cube's love of

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 642: Pump Up the Valium
episodes.description: On this safe and sane episode we definitely don't discuss residential bomb-making, but do talk Hyper Scape, Golf on Mars, more Trackmania, the Evo Online cancellation, $70 video games, Fallout on TV, and... butter on pop tart?!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 641: Hey, Throw Your Molotovs!
episodes.description: This week: Jan finished The Last of Us, Jeff's got a track mania, Ben's fighting herds (professionally), the beginnings of corporate action on assault and abuse, the latest Xbox Lockhart rumors, a PokeMOBA (?!), and a fond farewell to Andy McNamara's stor

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 640: Tactical Growth
episodes.description: This week we unpack the current assault and abuse allegations roiling the games industry, the abrupt Mixer shutdown, EA Play, the rumored Rocksteady Suicide Squad game, more with The Last of Us Part II, Windjammers II, and the mysterious couch of Masahiro

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 639: Ribcages Per Capita
episodes.description: It's (nearly) all PlayStation 5, all the time around here this week, but we also find room for The Last of Us Part II, Torchlight III, Disintegration, Star Wars: Squadrons, Persona 4 on PC, and a very, uh, loving Alex Kidd retrospective.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 638: I Found Drugs in a Locker and I Did Them
episodes.description: This week we clear the air on Fog Gaming, check in on C&C Remastered, the new Trackmania, and Phantasy Star Online 2 PC, talk about the future of Destiny 2, keep up with a bunch of rumors for summer game announcements, and discover a very special them

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 637: Slow Off King
episodes.description: Austin Walker and Vinny Caravella drop by during a tumultuous week to talk current events, Valorant, Monster Train, PS5 and Xbox Series X compatbility (backwards and forwards), the coming Sega revolution, Minecraft personality types, and where to get the

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 636: Dragon Attack 11: Aftermath
episodes.description: Hey, you like video games? How about Minecraft Dungeons? Mortal Kombat 11's story DLC? Saints Row The Third's remaster? Perhaps Super Mario Bros. Special? Inquire within!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 635: S-rank With Your Coffee Dad
episodes.description: This week we welcome back Brad (and the tales of his nose), dig and craft in Minecraft and Terraria, gawk at that Unreal Engine 5 demo, speculate about Ghost of Tsushima and the new Paper Mario, debate video game rap battles and esports rules, and enter a

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 634: Mozzarella Tape
episodes.description: The Birdman is back and so is the Giant Bombcast! We cover texts from Tony Hawk, everything that premiered during the Xbox Series X event, testing our gaming trivia knowledge, and so much more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 633: Potion Balls
episodes.description: In these unprecedented times we gathered together to talk about Streets of Rage 4, the Predator film franchise, a possible new (old) Skate game, and much more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 632: A Place for Hair
episodes.description: We're deep into tactics this week, both of the Gears and XCOM: Chimera Squad variety, along with WWE 2K Battlegrounds, the Last of Us II leak, shoto wrestlers, the crucial 3DO back catalog, Tinder hentai, teenage video game crimes, and fridges full of pro

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 631: Doom Nuts & Bolts
episodes.description: This week we dig into Persona 5 Royal, the Guilty Gear -Strive- beta, more Fallout 76 (?), the final Mario Maker 2 update (?!), Sony's PlayStation 5 production plans, Jan's good Internet, and how to eat 30 eggs in one day.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 630: NPCs Are Here
episodes.description: We talk up a storm about a return trip to Fallout 76, finishing the FF7 remake, the blessed end of Bunny Day, a new Resident Evil 4, virtual dating, more Internet Phantasy Star, that new XCOM, eggs of all flavors, and the missing WWE game.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 629: Give Me a Werewolf
episodes.description: This week: the surprise PlayStation 5 DualSense controller announcement, the Final Fantasy VII remake, the end of Doom Eternal, The Last of Us Part II delay, Atari crypto, 40 hot dogs and buns, a quick pants check, and your emails!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 628: Respect the Headcrab
episodes.description: The games continue to pile up, with more on Animal Crossing, Doom Eternal, Ori, Resident Evil 3, the Control DLC, and One Step From Eden. Plus: the Modern Warfare 2 surprise remaster, a Dragon's Lair movie, and... Super Mario All-Stars 2?

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 627: Final Fight Questions
episodes.description: Games games games! This week we get deep into Animal Crossing: New Horizons, Doom Eternal, and Half-Life: Alyx, talk PlayStation 5 details, think really hard about Artifact 2, and finally decide that age-old question: Splinter Cell or Samba de Amigo?

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 626: All You S'mores Juice Fans
episodes.description: Our brand new series Bombcast@Home kicks off with discussions of life in quarantine, Doom Eternal, the full Xbox Series X specs, the cancellation of E3 and everything else, and washing your groceries!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 625: Take Me to the YouTube
episodes.description: This week we spend some time with Ori and COD: MW's Battle Royale, look at COVID-19's effect on the games industry, place bets on E3's chances of... happening, and take emails from you, the fans of 311.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 624: Depth and Lightness
episodes.description: On this Super Tuesday, we ask: what is it people want from modernity? Is it a new Trackmania? A delayed GDC? Thoughts on Final Fantasy 7 Remake and Ori and the Will of the Wisps? To abolish shoestring fries? A 311 concert which continues unto eternity? In

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 623: It Might Be a Whammo!
episodes.description: From new Xbox Series X details to coronavirus fears, Steam indies like Taur and Quantum League, our latest fighting game roundup, the second coming of Burnout Paradise, a nunchaku clinic, and the dystopian sound of NookLink, this week there's a lot to tal

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 622: The Squattery Wheel
episodes.description: We're joined by the superhuman Matthew Rorie to discuss the trials and tribulations of Wolcen, Pokemon Home, E3 2020, PlayStation 5 pricing, the StarCraft Ghost leak, the ill fate of HQ Trivia, Jan's corporate espionage, and the dire state of monster truc

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 621: Groove Is in the Heart VR
episodes.description: Are we splitting or stealing this week? Does Granblue Fantasy: Versus count as anime? Will Rockstar ever make another Grand Theft Auto? Why in the world is Phantasy Star Online 2 finally coming out in English? Is Space Channel 5 good? The answers--and muc

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 620: Fortune Chalupa
episodes.description: All kinds of news is happening this week, from E3's 2020 plans to Dan Houser's Rockstar departure. Also: the GeForce Now launch, the #Platinum4, Blizzard's Warcraft III boondoggle, and more on the mysterious Xbox Series X port that wouldn't quit.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 619: The Jäger Cube
episodes.description: This week we Journey to the Savage Planet, train up some Temtem, get ReMinded about Kingdom Hearts III, puzzle over Xbox prototypes and Atari Hotels, and reminisce fondly about everyone's favorite .mp3 llama.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 618: Teach Gohan to Fish
episodes.description: This week we talk Doom Eternal and DBZ Kakarot, PlayStation 5 leaks and delay after delay, the great Byleth conspiracy, boiling eyeballs, a Halo retrospective, the video-rental-to-liquor-store pipeline, and a sighting of the elusive "coin ship."

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 617: Bathtub Full of Food
episodes.description: We welcome Brad back as we discuss Sony skipping out on E3, Nintendo's upcoming theme park, the Epic Games Store, what Wattam is, and much more on this week's Giant Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 616: Sonic's Wife
episodes.description: We're back from the holidays! Come along as we recount our activities during the break, new console logos, CES news, the anatomy of an echidna, and much more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 615: Favorite Crime
episodes.description: The white smoke has cleared and revealed another episode of the GIANT BOMBCAST!  We discuss the upcoming game releases of 2020, video game themed classes, and our favorite crimes!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2019: Day Five Deliberations
episodes.description: The final day is here! Many games will enter, but only 10 can leave. Which one will reign supreme?

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2019: Day Four Deliberations
episodes.description: The list is done, the time for casual talk is through. Time to dole out awards, including Best Story, Best Music, Best Style, and Cool Multiplayer Thing!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2019: Day Three Deliberations
episodes.description: It's time to soldier through the end of this list of 2019's most notable games. No game will be forgotten! Only awards remain!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2019: Day Two Deliberations
episodes.description: Our second day of discussions takes us deep into our list of 2019's most important games and the impressions they left on us.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2019: Day One Deliberations
episodes.description: The imminent end of 2019 means only one thing: it's time for us to sit in a room and talk through all the games that mattered to us this year.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 614: The Sonic Bible
episodes.description: Surprises are around every corner! We talk about the newly announced Xbox Series X, the Game Awards, 2019's Capcom Cup, the origin of planet Mobius, and much much more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 613: The Universal Sauce
episodes.description: The year may be winding down, but game announcements aren't! We go through Sony's State of Play and the new Switch indies, speculate about a new BioShock, pitch the future of Darkstalkers, evaluate Juggalo gangs, and get a crash course on jacket potatoes.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 612: Two Two Tacos
episodes.description: This week we're joined by a very special guest: you! Join us for a whole bunch of e- and voice mails as we entertain your thoughts on fast-food ordering, Death Stranding spreadsheets, puffy jackets, and other topics of the day.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 611: "jedi council pink floyd"
episodes.description: This week we run down a bunch of our GOTY backlog prep, get deep-ish into Disco Elysium, discuss the Half-Life: Alyx trailer, ponder the future of Tony Hawk (again), take a Star Wars minute, and get hyped for more Resi.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 610: #Piñexit
episodes.description: Google Stadia, Pokemon Sword & Shield, Jedi: Fallen Order, a new Half-Life (?!), a new Mass Effect (?!?), "Anthem Next," Ring Fit Adventure, X019: this podcast is practically bursting at the seams!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 609: Terry Bogard 2020
episodes.description: This week we're trucking right along with Death Stranding, Luigi's Mansion 3, and The Outer Worlds, plus a lot of ruminating on new consoles, the best 3DS games, a ranking of fruit, Limp Bizkit survival strategies, and a quick Sonic the Hedgehog watch par

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 608: OK DOOMer
episodes.description: The Death Stranding embargo is up, and unsurprisingly it's hard to talk about much else, but we also get deep into a Blizzcon recap with thoughts on Diablo IV and Overwatch 2, Luigi's Mansion 3, Switch Lite sales figures, Hideo Kojima's filmmaking career,

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 607: The Wang Chung Zone
episodes.description: This week: EA's (back) on Steam, Death Stranding comes to PC, a COD: MW report, some Blizzcon speculation, details on our Extra Life plans, and more of the worst (best) songs of the '80s, as chosen by you!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 606: PlayStation Vita 2
episodes.description: This week we're bowled over by The Outer Worlds, Jan talks Digimon puberty, the Analogue Pocket looks super slick, Blizzard attracts the ire of Congress, and we... hate the '80s?

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 605: Baby's First Earthquake
episodes.description: Instead of all the embargoed games we can't talk about, this week we get into MiSTer updates, Gabe's missing minigun, a bit of Final Fantasy reminiscing, speculation about new-console load times, soda beer, more bad (?) '80s songs, and the ongoing reverbe

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 604: I'll Battle Pass!
episodes.description: Gaaaaames! Destiny 2: Shadowkeep, Trine 4, Indivisible, Concrete Genie, and the new Yooka-Laylee are out this week, plus the latest on PlayStation 5, Red Dead 2 PC, and Blizzard's Hearthstone e-sports controversy.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 603: Call of Tuesday
episodes.description: Video games! Ghost Recon Breakpoint, The Last of Us Part II, Code Vein, The Surge 2, Card of Darkness, Call of Duty Mobile, Untitled Goose Game, Outer Wilds... Surely we talk about stuff besides games this week too. Probably.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 602: Easy Chicken
episodes.description: A zillion games came out last week and we're here to talk about like 12 of them! Let's check in on Apple Arcade's lineup, Link's Awakening, and Borderlands 3. Then let's get into the news... is Valve going to have to let you resell your games? Weird! The

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 601: Chief Daedra Officer
episodes.description: This week: We're all playing (and talking about) Borderlands 3, Jeff spent some time with Apple Arcade, E3 2020 gets influential, Billy Mitchell gets litigious, and we get the inside scoop on QVC promotions and open-source car-hacking.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 600: Big Game Pass
episodes.description: This week we dig into Gears the Fifth, Ghost Recon Breakpoint, new Monster Hunter and PvZ, the weirdest Nintendo Direct, Apple's Arcade, car firmware updates, and the curious case of the Borderlands reviews.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 599: Podcasts Are for Vampires
episodes.description: Some old friends show up in the studio to talk about playing the Avengers game, the greatness of Control, merging Destiny characters, new iterations of old arguments, and the week's fraught events in the game industry.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 598: The Tank, the Healer, and the Damage-Dealer
episodes.description: Noclip's Danny O'Dwyer lands in the studio on his way to PAX to get deep into Control, Outer Wilds, and Creature in the Well, ponder Tom Holland's age-appropriateness, speculate about new-console launch lineups, and discuss at length the noble cockroach.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 597: Watering a Plastic Succulent
episodes.description: GameSpot's Lucy James and Tamoor Hussain stop by to discuss coming to America, third-person peeing, all the news out of Gamescom, being grumpy about Overwatch, and a textbook example of conflict resolution.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 596: Math Amphetamine
episodes.description: Games are approaching! But before the Fall releases start, we take a little more time with Fire Emblem, check out Rebel Galaxy Outlaw and RAD, talk loot box developments, talk through more than one weird concert report, and take another round of your food

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 595: It's Always the Cute Monks
episodes.description: GameSpot's Kallie Plagge and Michael Higham drop by with more on Fire Emblem and Wolfenstein, an on-the-scene EVO 2019 report, a word on the events of the weekend, and our ever-popular segment, foodmails.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 594: Tea Leads to Intimacy
episodes.description: This week world traveler Drew Scanlon lands in the studio to talk about the new Fire Emblem, the new Wolfenstein, multiplayer solitaire, air traffic role-playing, revitalizing Star Fox, tragic data loss, and cooking with soda.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 593: Bad Gamer Dads
episodes.description: Noted gamer dad Will Smith drops by to talk about Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3, Dota Underlords, drifting Joy Cons, Tom DeLonge's alien fetish, computer cabinets, toads in the hole, and Odin's favorite household objects.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 592: Extra Ribcage Edition
episodes.description: The Switch Lite is the big story of the week, but we also touch on Dragon Quest Builders 2, SolSeraph, and FFXIV, get deep into the future of Capcom fighting, contemplate cinematic fatalities, argue about pigs in blankets, and get in the mud at the demoli

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 591: WOLF MERLIN WOLF
episodes.description: The Bombcast is back with field reports from Super Mario Maker 2, Teppen, and Apex Legends Season 2. Then we wade back into the ever-growing auto chess swamp, ask if Nintendo is falling behind the competition, and, in what must be a first, we deliberately

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 590: Ice Cube Is Our Coworker
episodes.description: This week's hot topics include Mario Maker 2, CEO, console tariffs, the PUBG "universe," the Black Ops 4 that could have been, a variety of chicken/waffle configurations, Barenaked pinball, and the origin of inverted castles.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 589: The Homie Protocol
episodes.description: This week we break, uh, protocol by starting with a gigantic pile of your emails, before moving on to Bloodstained, Samurai Shodown, Shang Tsung, more Auto Chess of various flavors, and the news of the day.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 588: Tingle Gave Me His Dowser!
episodes.description: This week we do some post-E3 housekeeping and run down our favorite moments of the show, gush at length about Cadence of Hyrule, express bafflement at all this automatic chess, and take a ton of your emails!

episodes.title: Giant Bomb @ Nite - Live From E3 2019: Nite 3
episodes.description: This is it folks, the final Nite of the show.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb @ Nite - Live From E3 2019: Nite 2
episodes.description: The mayhem continues on Nite 2 of E3.

episodes.title: Giant Bomb @ Nite - Live From E3 2019: Nite 1
episodes.description: Nite 1 is here!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 587: Tac-Yak
episodes.description: We rip open the annual E3 sealed envelope to discuss all the games from judges' week like Doom Eternal, Wolfenstein Youngblood, The Outer Worlds, and more. Plus: a rundown of our schedule at the show and another round of our guaranteed accurate E3 predict

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 586: Functional Shang Tsung!
episodes.description: Our last show before E3 sees us digging through a mountain of news, leaks, and rumors in advance of the show, connecting to Death Stranding, speculating about the scent of the Xbox, and pondering the slow, slow nature of the Truck.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 585: The Hentai Highway
episodes.description: Before E3 arrives, we spend a little more time dipping into the games of the day like Void Bastards, Mortal Kombat 11, and Dauntless, saying farewell to the Ouya, pondering decade-old buffalo sauce, and digging into that hot new fantasy show everyone's ta

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 584: Bend It Like Blevins
episodes.description: We all ponder lucrative careers as Fortnite players and/or makeup influencers before instead discussing the ESA's turmoil and the future of E3, additional time with Rage 2, Oculus Quest, more Mario Maker, and the fate of Jean-Luc Cougar.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 583: "Under the Top!"
episodes.description: This week we dive into Rage 2's vaguely pink wasteland, Mordhau's medieval kombat, loot box legislation, Tetris downloads, the new Ghost Recon, the old Final Fantasy, that jerk Bulbasaur, and what makes a hoodie a hoodie.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 582: It's 4:20 Somewhere!
episodes.description: It's a little slow on the new games dropping front but we talk about Ben and Jan's trip to the movies, what's legal in Denver, Xbox's Community Standards, the Video Game Hall of Fame, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 581: Six on the Face
episodes.description: MK11 continues to dominate the office, but we also mix in Forager, the latest spate of video game labor issues, Mario styli, cartridge fetishism, controller evolution, Steven Tyler's knife, and... that trailer.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 580: Where Is Kidd Thunder?
episodes.description: We've really got Mortal Kombat on the brain this week, but we also make time for Steamworld Quest, Iron Man VR, the latest pre-E3 console news, strangers in hotel rooms, influencer influencers, and the mysterious case of the flying crab.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 579: BATS NOT BALLS
episodes.description: Sony details the next PlayStation out of nowhere and it isn't even the most contentious topic of the week! Respawn's Star Wars, Janina Gavankar's Horizon leak, genuine Sanwa parts: this podcast has it all.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 578: Chrome-Ass GameCube
episodes.description: After the requisite Wrestlemania wrap-up, we drive dangerously, test our falconry skills, hit max level in D.C., go to MiSTer school, ponder the Smurf reproductive system, and listen to one very special Soundcloud.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 577: Google Doggie Kruger
episodes.description: With PAX in the rearview mirror, we get serious about E3 speculation and the future of game consoles and streaming, then even more serious about Power Rangers, then even MORE serious about owning a Dig Dug machine.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 576: I Sometimes Play the Switch
episodes.description: This week we die more than twice in Sekiro, pop back into The Division 2, and play more of BaBa Is You. We also share stories about Jan's time on a farm, whether or not Jason's eye is fine, and fondly remember "YOUR SOUL IS MINE".

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 575: Thousand-Player Battle Royale
episodes.description: Google finally takes the lid off Stadia, its streaming platform, and we're excited and terrified. Also: MK11, BaBa Is You, Hypnospace Outlaw, chameleons, a ranking of chips, super cocaine, and Rich Gallup!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 574: DST Is DTF
episodes.description: We talk about the how things are going in Washington D.C. with The Division 2, reading poetry in Devil May Cry 5, Nintendo's ventures into cardboard based VR, carrying Goombas, and Zac Effron's celebrity status.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 573: Resting Grimace Face
episodes.description: This week: there's a new pair of Pokemon games, ToeJam and Earl return (again), Evo 2019 drops some surprises, a disc-less Xbox might be out soon, and Sonic gets real in Chili Dog City.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 572: Giana Maker
episodes.description: On this week's show we dive deep into a wild week of news, pop wheelies in Trials Rising, check in on Wargroove, Dead or Alive 6, and Anthem, and have a viewing party for the latest from Detective Pikachu.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 571: It's Like a Big Slider
episodes.description: Games games games! We dig into Tetris 99, Anthem, Crackdown 3, and Far Cry: New Dawn, along with the momentous Nintendo Direct, Activision layoffs, the future of Fortnite and Apex Legends, and our thoughts on tiny sandwiches.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 570: EA's Got a Fortnite!
episodes.description: We're playing a ton of Apex Legends around here, but also finding time for God Eater 3, Devil May Cry V, Astroneer, Dota Auto Chess, Kingdom Hearts III, the news, your emails, and the current whereabouts of Kevin McCallister.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 569: Please Tip Your Jumpmaster
episodes.description: Respawn drops a new game out of nowhere and we spend a bunch of time talking about it, plus a smaller Switch, IRC memories, a world of Dr. Mario, a visit to the Strangereal, and a fresh serving of new-console speculation.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 568: Metroid Crime
episodes.description: This week we welcome back Brad and his adventures with Resident Evil 2, Anthem, wrestling news, leftover chicken wings, and the wild ride that is Kingdom Hearts III.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 567: Two Arms Holding It Open
episodes.description: This week we recap Jeff's trip to check out Mortal Kombat 11, Travis Strikes Again, Artifact, the different ways to consume coffee, and FREE MONEY!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 566: Earthworm Jim = Duke Nukem
episodes.description: This week: strange goings on at Gearbox, Bungie's latest bid for independence, SNES on Switch, Onimusha Warlords, God Eater 3, Bloodborne, Momodora, and your emails!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 565: My Son Keith
episodes.description: The 2019 deluxe model of the Giant Bombcast includes power steering, personalized climate control, and eight cylinders of high-octane video game discussion.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 564: EXIT FLU
episodes.description: It's 2019, but the office is still closed, so we holed up at the edge of the world to talk about some of 2019's upcoming video games, your voice mails, and... that Tumblr account?

episodes.title: Game of the Year 2018: Day Five Deliberations
episodes.description: This is it, our discussions around Best Story, Best Ongoing Game, Best Looking, Most Disappointing, and our top 10 games of the year.

episodes.title: Game of the Year 2018: Day Four Deliberations
episodes.description: Our first day of awards includes Best Styyyyyyyle, Best Music, Best Debut, Hottest Mess, and Best Moment or Sequence.

episodes.title: Game of the Year 2018: Day Three Deliberations
episodes.description: Day three sees us rounding out 2018 with discussions of the year end's heavy hitters. On to the awards!

episodes.title: Game of the Year 2018: Day Two Deliberations
episodes.description: It's day two, and we're plowing through another huge chunk of 2018's most notable games on our way to the awards.

episodes.title: Game of the Year 2018: Day One Deliberations
episodes.description: Our 2018 awards feature begins at the beginning, with a deep dive on the list of games that mattered to us this year.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 563: Sopping Wet Socks
episodes.description: We're here with the final "normal" Giant Bombcast of 2018, so let's get into some Smash Bros. unlocks, Earth Defense Force 5, Heroes of the Storm, slinging $100 copies of Kingdom Hearts III, Battlefield V, and your chicken skin-related emails!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 562: Super Dark Souls
episodes.description: This week we plow through the news bounty that dropped during the Game Awards, Smash Ultimate, the new Monster Boy, Ashen, Hades, and that new Sonic movie, uh, "artwork."

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 561: The Bad Guy Likes Weather
episodes.description: Just Cause 4! Red Dead Online! The Epic store! Canvas bags! Ultraviolet poo! It's a Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 560: NO HAND SHAKE
episodes.description: The gang's (almost) all here to get GOTY-ready and talk up the PlayStation Classic, Darksiders III, Kingdom Hearts lore, hot dog strategies, pizza strategies, our new-console wish list, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 559: Chocolate Upgrade
episodes.description: This week we dig into new Pokemon of all sorts, the Dota card game, the mystery of Fallout 76, Sony's E3 absence, the maybe forthcoming new consoles, co-op Tetris, lucrative class-action windfalls, and horse-punching.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 558: Boattle Royale
episodes.description: Hitman 2! Tetris Effect! Battlefield V! The games of Fall are upon us, followed by a raft of rocky stories in the games biz, questionable emails about food, towel habits, edible Mario enemies, and the return of Banjo & Kazooie (who never really left).

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 557: Piranha Plant Did Nothing Wrong
episodes.description: This week we're coming in hot off of Extra Life to talk The Quiet Man, more RDR2 adventures, the Black Ops season pass, the Diablo mobile kerfuffle, Deltarune, bulk video games, and bizarre cupcake strategies.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 556: The Experience of Going Viral
episodes.description: GameSpot's Lucy James joins in to help us break down Red Dead Redemption 2, Diablo 3 on Switch, the PlayStation Classic lineup, Overwatch esports, coffee 'n Corn Flakes, enhanced gaming positions, and attending a London Raiders game.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 555: Super Mario Bros. Review
episodes.description: With releases heating up, we're here to rate all the season's most important games, including Soulcalibur VI, Return of the Obra Dinn, and Black Ops 4. Plus: new old-game consoles, working at Rockstar, the goings-on at Oculus, and a lengthy look back at t

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast We're Sorry: Ten Years of The Giant Bombcast
episodes.description: This year the Giant Bombcast turned 10. To celebrate, we got ourselves the gift of a special bonus episode. We asked fans to submit their favorite Bombcast memories, and we've compiled some of them, in addition to behind-the-scenes stories and anecdotes,

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 554: A Nice Skin Deal
episodes.description: This week we dig as deep into Black Ops IIII as humanly possible, ponder the correct boss order in Mega Man 11, puzzle at the oddities of PSN name changes, say the words "Borderlands 3," and have a lengthy oatmeal chat!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 553: Hot Dogs and Helmut Kruger
episodes.description: Hitman 2! Super Mario Party! Dead or Alive 6! Shady keyloggers! Destiny raids! New Switches! Xbox streaming! Harry Potter! Dead goats! Butter on Poptarts! This podcast has it all!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 552: Uncle of the Year
episodes.description: Mike Mahardy gallups in with the dirt on Red Dead Redemption 2 and Assassin's Creed Odyssey, before we move on to other current games like Forza Horizon 4 and Phantasy Star Online. Also: Sony's cross-play about-face, Skrillex' current whereabouts, and a l

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 551: Digital Didgeridudes
episodes.description: It must be the Fall because we have a stack of games to discuss, including Forza Horizon 4, Timespinner, Valkyria Chronicles 4, CrossCode, Ring of Elysium, and more. Also: the Telltale closure, the PlayStation Classic, and never, ever washing your jeans.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 550: Sauce Shaming
episodes.description: This week we run through a stack of Nintendo news, check out Capcom beat-em-ups, remember the Intellivision, ponder the recent pinball switcheroo, break down a good air juggle, and puzzle at the name of the New York System.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 549: Reboot the Pearl!
episodes.description: Games! They're coming out and we're talking about them, including Spider-Man, Destiny 2: Forsaken, Shadow of the Tomb Raider, and COD's Blackout mode, along with pre-TGS news, a Fall Out Boy field report, and a check-in with our intrepid East Coast corres

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 548: The Shush-Shush Lad
episodes.description: We wrap up an action-packed PAX by running down Artifact, Windjammers 2, and Streets of Rage 4, go deep on Spider-Man for PS4, think over Tim Kitzrow's career options, sample some coffee soup, and get very opinionated about Raichu.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 547: Smash Bros. Tournament Hygiene
episodes.description: This week we take a trip to Donut County, join the Strange Brigade, talk about more games hidden in ceilings, argue about Punch-Out, and ponder the nature of the phrase "Streets of Rage 4."

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 546: Declaration of Hot Dogs
episodes.description: Noted European Gary Whitta stops by to help us make sense of Gamescom, esports careers, Windjammers 2 (?!?), expensive graphics cards, the future fate of Alameda, and the best misters.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 545: School Meat
episodes.description: This week we climb into the gnomish time machine to discuss Battle for Azeroth, talk through the Doom Eternal and Red Dead 2 game reveals, ponder the asset-thieving weirdness of Jazztronauts, and figure out the best way to open a door!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 544: Watch Streaming or Eat Delicious Pizza
episodes.description: Ben and Jan return from Vegas with an Evo field report, we all get way into Dead Cells, a bunch of business gets talked about, and the name "Bernie Stolar" is said a surprising number of times, all on this week's Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 543: Don't Truckshame Your Dad
episodes.description: We talk at leeeength about the No Man's Sky NEXT update, along with this week's procedural platformer Chasm, tons of Nintendo sales data, cryptojacking, everyone's blood types, B-tier handhelds, and even more shower time.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 542: Submarineway
episodes.description: With the dry summer in full effect, we talk about our hopes for No Man's Sky NEXT, Dead Cells, and whatever that new Phantasy Star game is, along with Nintendo lawsuits, mobile money laundering, Street Fighter 6, and the return of shower habits.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 541: Yerb Up!
episodes.description: This week we have Ben's further Octopath travels, the new (old) Tempest, another trip to the Danger Zone, E3 emulator war stories, a Sonic/Tinder field report, the king of Kings, and the violent legacy of Panic Park.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 540: Sailor Bruno Mars
episodes.description: This week Jeff returns from Anime Expo with a travelogue you won't want to miss, plus Pocket Rumble, Jan's NJPW experience, the ArenaNet controversy, BioWare romance options, and one very questionable hoodie.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 539: Summer Dump Zone
episodes.description: What do Wreckfest, Fighting EX Layer, clickers du jour, Google game streaming, Metal Gear Solid 4, the impending Sonic the Hedgehog motion picture, and the NorCal apocalypse have in common? They're all discussed on this podcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 538: Dashing Carburetor of the Owl
episodes.description: As the summer heat sets in, cool off with some coooool topics like Lumines Remastered, The Crew 2, Mario Tennis Aces, Xbox and Nintendo's, uh, brandmance, and the latest from Akon, Tony Hawk, and Socks the Cat.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 537: Kick Merlin out the Casino
episodes.description: We're back from E3 with... a big long wrap-up of E3, followed by Onrush, Yoku's Island Express, Royales of multiple varieties, data cap woes, handheld memories, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb @ Nite - Live From E3 2018: Nite 3: The Podcast
episodes.description: Here it is: our final show featuring a slew of amazing guests such as Janina Gavankar, Austin Creed, John Drake... and whatever the hell this last segment is.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb @ Nite - Live From E3 2018: Nite 2: The Podcast
episodes.description: We're joined by Xbox boss Phil Spencer, Mortal Kombat boss Ed Boon, Waypoint boss Austin Walker, and many more.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb @ Nite - Live From E3 2018: Nite 1: The Podcast
episodes.description: Night one features your Giant Bomb editor check in, Xbox and Nintendo indies, 505 Games, and some friends from other press outlets.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 536: We Should Make a Lu Bu Game
episodes.description: As E3 opens, listen to us run down all the games Jeff saw during the pre-show judges week, plus our highly accurate expectations for the show!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 535: Our Crazy Apocalypse
episodes.description: With days to go till E3, New York's own Alex Navarro swoops in to help us make sense of Fallout 76, Assassin's Creed Odyssey, Yoku's Island Express, OnRush, Atari boxes, and Mortal Kombat Gold?

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 534: Forklift Academy
episodes.description: Back on up to the loading dock for the latest scuttlebutt about Blazblue: Cross Tag Battle, Street Fighter's 30th-ish anniversary, the return of PixelJunk, PUBG lawsuits, the future of PlayStation, and pre-E3 thoughts big and small.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 533: We've Got the Truck Stick!
episodes.description: "Scoops" Klepek is in the studio to help walk us through the Black Ops IIII reveal, hands-on with Dreams, the li'l Neo Geo, hard zombie times, and the tyranny of electric sidewalk scooters.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 532: Hard Onboard
episodes.description: The good ship E3 has sprung a few leaks, and Will Smith is here to help us bail as fast as we can. Also: State of Decay 2, Frostpunk, the new Dota Battle Pi... uh, Pass, the Rage 2 announcement, Star Fox Karts, and your emails!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 531: Domestic Beers and Zoolander
episodes.description: Try to hold your pee long enough to listen to us talk about E3 hopes and dreams, VR lightsabers, Nintendo Switch Online, Super Ubi Bros., tragic pinball developments, and the magic of the renaissance faire.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 530: Olympic Uno
episodes.description: Late-game thoughts on God of War, the legality of loot boxes, all kinds of Nintendo goings on, Lunchable heating strategies, memories of lousy music teachers, and a dawning awareness of E3 await in this week's Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 529: POLICE USE NUNCHAKU
episodes.description: This week we dig into cardboard video games, God of War, Swords of Ditto, Call of Duty's multiplayer-only future, Valve's Campo Santo, Neo Geo nostalgia, the great domain-name scam, college martial arts, and a big giant list of E3 maybes.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 528: Boy!
episodes.description: This week we talk about the early hours of Kratos and his son's new adventure, some hardcore boat action, some hardcore "action," the proper way to enjoy a PB&J sandwich, and way more.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 527: LINE NOISE!!
episodes.description: In the wake of PAX and Wrestlemania, we check in on Extinction, Far Cry 5, Ni no Kuni II, Boss Key's battle royale, the return of Sam Fisher, GBA excellence, serious piñata management, and the whereabouts of Richard Grieco.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 526: Ultra Mario
episodes.description: This week we're all about old and new arcade games, consoles that did and didn't exist, and rampant E3 speculation, with a dash of new releases like Minit, Ni no Kuni 2, and Far Cry 5 for good measure!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 525: The Chocolate Mystery
episodes.description: The Giant Bomb Gang gathers to talk about Far Cry 5, gentleman's club buffets, Ni no Kuni II, Jason's powered skateboard, new Fortnite records, the latest video game news, your emails, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 524: Rez 2
episodes.description: Mark MacDonald and John Ricciardi swoop in to chat about the state of Japanese games (besides Rez 2, which does not exist), Sea of Thieves, the Fortnite craze, Ubisoft's newfound freedom, and world-traveling World Warriors.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 523: Realistic Wad of Flesh
episodes.description: We've braved the light drizzle outside to go in on hot topics like Fortnite mobile, Black Ops IIII, Dota subscriptions, the Nintendo Direct, Burnout Paradise Remastered, Into the Breach's continued dominance, and the mysterious egg beer.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 522: Shuckin' Drive
episodes.description: This week Into the Breach is the only thing most of us can think about, but we manage to mix Battlefield: WWII, Hunt: Showdown, Vermintide 2, free Yakuza, Capcom vs. Capcom, good platformer physics, and bad Chrono Trigger into the show for good measure.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 521: On the Devil's Level
episodes.description: This week we're obligated to dive deep on the entirety of Metal Gear Survive, plus Into the Breach, Hunt: Showdown, Activision moving and shaking, Switch homebrew, illicit GameStop goings-on, and the class conflict of PapaPriority.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 520: Nice Meme, Jeff
episodes.description: This week on the podcast train, we give up our seat for Metal Gear Survive, hold the door for Burnout Paradise Remastered, glance suspiciously at Atari's cryptocurrency, and strike up a friendly conversation with your emails.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 519: Jim Davis Get Paid Dot Biz
episodes.description: We're on a globetrotting search for lasagna and bootleg Burger King, along the way encountering Monster Hunter: World, the Analogue Super NT, Metroid Prime 4 rumors, Bone Thugs-n-Zelda, and the latest on Billy Mitchell's MAME adventure.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 518: I'm Known for My Viscous Dips
episodes.description: Ben returns to the office to find we all got way into Dragon Ball and Monster Hunter in his absence. Only lengthy discussions of hockey jersey numbers, arcade high score controversies, Sword of Sodan, and the Mario movie can return us to normalcy.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 517: Master Roshi's Adult Bookstore
episodes.description: We can finally talk about Dragon Ball FighterZ and Monster Hunter: World, and we do just that! Also: Celeste, the Sea of Thieves beta, the Anthem delay, old gaming jargon, snakes on a boat, and dubious investment opportunities.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 516: God-Damn ROMs
episodes.description: The news is popping off this week with Nintendo Labo, Xbox's widened Game Pass, game industry moving and shaking, John Cena's movie career, and... PlayStation shoes, plus games like Monster Hunter and Dragon Ball we can barely talk about!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 515: The Bionic Beaver
episodes.description: This week we're hot in pursuit of moose and squirrel, but along the way we run into Street Fighter V: AE, Horizon DLC, Nintendo's tiny Direct, horrible Silicon Valley beverages, Canadian computers, and thoughts on the state of the arcade scene.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 514: Carpe Light Gun
episodes.description: Rorie pops in to talk about Jeff's Reno trip, the latest in VR and TV, some exciting website updates, a Ben check-in, X-Men on the Genesis, and recapturing the magic of arcade light gun games.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 513: 2018 Stick
episodes.description: We're ringing in the new year with chat about a bunch of old years that include Apple II gaming, Usenet archives, Trumpet Winsock, and vector monitors. Oh, there are some new games too. Happy 2018!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2017: Day Five Deliberations
episodes.description: This is it! On the fifth and final day we deliver Best Super Mario Odyssey Capture, Best Cast of Characters, Worst Game (That We Played), and Best Game.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2017: Day Four Deliberations
episodes.description: It's day four of the awards, and that means it's time for Best Debut, Best Styyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyle, Best New Character, and Best Story.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2017: Day Three Deliberations
episodes.description: On the third day of Game of the Year, my true love gave to me Best World, PLEASE STOP, Best Wolfenstein II Moment or Sequence, and Best Sequence.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2017: Day Two Deliberations
episodes.description: Day two brings cheer, nog, Best Multiplayer, Hottest Mess, Best Surprise, and Best Music.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2017: Day One Deliberations
episodes.description: Ye olde video game arguments commence with 2017's Old Game of the Year, Best Shopkeeper, Most Disappointing Game, and Best Looking Game.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Seasons Greetings From Giant Bomb
episodes.description: A message of thanks, and some quick housekeeping on our upcoming Game of the Year schedule.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 512: Nectar From Hector
episodes.description: Procedural building maintenance can't stop us (for long) from talking about the greatest of the Jaguar, competitive Catherine, how to Get Over It, eggs any style, crypto-gamer-cash, and your final emails of 2017.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 511: Baby in a Jar
episodes.description: It may be December, but there's plenty of news in the wake of the Game Awards and PSX. Also: PUBG on Xbox, the Monster Hunter World beta, Fighting EX Layer, Slurpee opportunities, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 510: Ken's Alpha Hair
episodes.description: We take a break from GOTY deliberations to talk about... other video games, the Mario cereal, improv teams, Mega Men, old arcade boards, and undercover narcs!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 509: Tom Nook's Grim Rictus
episodes.description: Our impossibly full studio brings you a chaotic discussion of the games of the day, live trivia play, the dire state of loot boxes, the meats of the Mushroom Kingdom, and the ongoing mystery of the fingernail bandit.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 508: Xfinity Heavy Industries
episodes.description: Loot boxes keep rearing their randomized heads all through this podcast, but we also manage to chat at length about our GOTY cram lists, Battle Chef Brigade, the perilous fate of the Trap Trebek, baby shampoo taste tests, and definitely not what the best

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 507: Mon Martha
episodes.description: This week we're cramming in games new and old, from Battlefront II and Mario Odyssey to Nier and Horizon, with a dash of EA acquisitions, Mario movies, Xbox One X sales, prank call analysis, discarded Sega hardware, and a brand new producer!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 506: CornFights.com
episodes.description: This week it takes us two hours to talk through all the big new releases flying to and fro, and that's before we even get to Blizzcon news, industry downsizing, trophies 4 cash, the perfect Street Fighter, and historic Monopoly scams.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 505: Put the Suit Jacket On, It's Time!
episodes.description: Greg Chiller... sorry, Miller joins us for a terrifying Halloween show full of Wolfenstein II, Mario Odyssey, Sony's Paris Games Week showing, the fate of the Visceral Games, and some really bad costumes.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 504: Tell Kent's Wife Where the Stuff Is
episodes.description: Virtual Reality's own Will Smith joins us to gab about Fire Emblem Warriors, PUBG hacks, secret Switch firmware, new Hitman stuff, old Xbox games, more storage units, and the recent allegations roiling the industry.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 503: Virtual Kevtris
episodes.description: This week's scrappy show covers Gran Turismo Sport, The Evil Within 2, Super NES wizardry, the shocking closure of Visceral Games, the latest VR goings on, runaway segment music, and your emails!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 502: Bad Wood
episodes.description: We've come through the smoke and flame to talk about Shadow of War (and its loot boxes), the truth about Mugman, Street Fighter V's Arcade Edition, many much Gundam Versus, shower spiders, Erik Estrada, and disturbing genetic facts.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 501: Wavy Tube Physics
episodes.description: The spookiest month begins with indie favs like Steamworld Dig 2 and Cuphead, a Destiny 2 raid post-mortem, Forza progression woes, Red Dead 2 trailer impressions, bootleg Star Fox 2 carts, and your b-mails!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 500: Half Jax
episodes.description: After pondering the advanced age of this podcast, we get back to business with Ruiner, Hob, Destiny 2 raid prep, Battle Royale beef, hopes and dreams for Borderlands 3, and thoughts on our tolerance for cold nuggs.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 499: The Huge Dudes
episodes.description: Ben and Jason gives us a deep dive on Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite, we try to shake our endgame Destiny 2 addiction, the words "Grand Theft Auto VI" are spoken, and Tokyo Game Show looms!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 498: Cat Spanker's Alley
episodes.description: This week it's hard to talk about anything besides Destiny 2, but we also touch on Fortnite's Battlegrounds, the second coming of the NES Classic, bad YouTube behavior, worthless video game systems, Mario's embrace of the bourgeoisie, and Kinects in casin

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 497: Tasteful but Stupid
episodes.description: PAX pox and heat waves can't stop us from convening for some real early Destiny 2 impressions, more on Mario + Rabbids, a quick PAX indie roundup, musings about mobile Puzzle Fighter, and the grave injustice of SNES cart reproductions.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 496: SiN Is My Half-Life
episodes.description: This week we talk about kinky rabbids, the Half-Life that wasn't, martial arts Dark Souls, the Switch voice chat boondoggle, the crime of butter on sandwiches, and your emails!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 495: Sludge Trudgin'
episodes.description: We've played a ton of games and now we're talking about 'em! Among them are Uncharted: The Lost Legacy, Sonic Mania, Agents of Mayhem, Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite, Monster Hunter: World, Dauntless, and MatterFall. Also: Gamescom! Also: scorpions!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 494: Fievel Fight
episodes.description: This week we round up as many new releases as we can, like Sonic Mania, Starcraft Remastered, and Matterfall, run down the end of the International, ponder card games, weigh in on scorpions and Riff Raff, and try on our best accents.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 493: Boosh! It's a Mess
episodes.description: We ruminate on Hellblade's intimate handling of psychosis, gush about Mossmouth's new game reveal, take sides in the Splatfest civil war, lust after crates full of miniskirts, and check in with Scottish Ben, all on this week's Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 492: Plug Into TV
episodes.description: GameSpot's Peter Brown pops in to chat about retro topics big and small, from the mini-Genesis boondoggle to prototype Ataris and five-figure Super Mario carts, along with the hottest games of the day like Tacoma, Pyre, Sundered, and maple syrup corndogs.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 491: Just a Bowl of Dough
episodes.description: Fresh off the state fair, noted Australian Ben regales us with tales of '90s bands and corndogs before we sink our teeth into Pyre, Splatoon 2, Kingsway, Fortnite, the Pokemon Go kerfuffle, the pitfalls of nostalgia, and a quick lesson on some slang from

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 490: Sometimes Pepperoni, Sometimes Hot Dog
episodes.description: A strange odor wafts through the halls of Giant Bomb, so we huddle in the podcast studio to chat about Splatoon 2, the Ataribox, all the action at EVO, the end (?) of the Miiverse, and the unexpected return of Casey Hudson.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 489: Cash 4 Wrestling
episodes.description: The dog days of summer are upon us, and with them quick impressions of the new Fire Pro, more gushing over Battlegrounds, some light Splatoon 2 chat, the whereabouts of Bobby Kotick, reflections on old tweets, and a totally authoritative discussion about

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 488: bigbomb@giantguy.ben
episodes.description: Hey, instead of blowing up your video game hands with fireworks, have a safe and sane 4th here. With us. And your emails?

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 487: Call of the Night Rooster
episodes.description: This week our SNESs are tiny and our Battle Passes leveled. Jeff checks in with Saturn modding. Brad checks in with PS VR. Ben finished Nier a thousand times. It's a podcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 486: The Episode After E3
episodes.description: Friend of the site Gary Whitta joins us to recap all our favorite stuff from last week's expo, along with a celebration of IO Interactive's new freedom, a gut check on Anthem, musings on the Ataribox, and our hopes for the glorious return of... avatars.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb at Nite - Live From E3 2017: Nite 3: The Podcast
episodes.description: E3 wraps up with a momentous range of guests from every nook and cranny of the games industry.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb at Nite - Live From E3 2017: Nite 2: The Podcast
episodes.description: Night two of E3 rolls on with professional wrestlers, world travelers, a cadre of knuckleheads, and players known and unknown.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb at Nite - Live From E3 2017: Nite 1: The Podcast
episodes.description: The first night of Electronic Three begins with a cavalcade of guests from every corner of the industry. Beers will be chugged! Vapes will be vaped!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 485: The E3 2017 Sealed Envelope
episodes.description: As this year's show floor opens, let's run through everything Jeff saw at judges' week and our probably wrong predictions about what we're gonna see at the show!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 484: Dirty Dusted Grandpa
episodes.description: Our last regular show before E3 sees us diving deep into Tekken 7, dissecting the Switch's weird online offering, pondering all the movers and shakers at the show, taking knife-vs-bat offworld, and tapping the wokest clicker ever made.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 483: Sega Flair Vs. Virtua Hogan
episodes.description: This week we stretch our Arms, crash into the Danger Zone, try and fail to play Friday the 13th, ponder the Far Cry 5 reveal, do some E3 speculatin', blast through a lightning round, and entertain the idea of a new Seaman?!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 482: Mega Duck Hunt
episodes.description: Jeff's back from LA with a bunch of thoughts on Destiny 2, then we turn to Far Cry 5, more turmoil at IO, Injustice 2, some very disturbing Rabbids, weird old consoles, and a few difficult questions.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 481: Rupert Grint's Ice Cream Truck
episodes.description: It's easy to forget E3 looms on the horizon with Farpoint, Battlegrounds, The Surge, Ubisoft's 2017 lineup, Alan Wake's delisting, Vanquish's PC release, IO Interactive's shocking betrayal, and live pinball to talk about!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 480: Bad Ball Feel
episodes.description: This week we check in with basketball games new and old, spend some time with Prey, dig into Persona 5 romance, do a little Spaceplanning, catch up on the hottest E3 leaks, and ask the new guy some pressing questions.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 479: McCree Overlord
episodes.description: We welcome our towering new member Ben Pack to a whopper of a podcast overflowing with Persona, Dota, Guilty Gear, Battlegrounds, Darksiders, corporate brand research, X-Pac, and only the most legal money-laundering schemes.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 478: Twelve Deaths a Year, Mostly by Heat Stroke
episodes.description: This week: COD goes back to WWII, Jeff goes to Vegas, Brad goes to Polecat country, Jason goes all Omega Force, and Rorie goes to the magical land of mismatched socks.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 477: The Husband Who Owned Himself
episodes.description: A couple of Thumbs swing by to dish on a bunch of game dev stuff, a deep dive into Zelda systems, the Full Throttle remaster, hot Admiral Ackbar gifs, and the legal rights of trees.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 476: Pinkies out for Duke
episodes.description: Hot topics this week include Battle(grounds) Royale, those Scorpio numbers, Nier's cyber-metafiction, questionable showering habits, Star Trek time travel, and remote car kill switches.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 475: Hey, What's Parappening?
episodes.description: This week GameSpot duo Peter Brown and Justin Haywald talk us through Persona 5's weird launch, Portland game hunts, news about Scorpio news, the end of Mad Catz, an unsettling discussion about Parappa, and scrappy breakfast cereals.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 474: "Fun!"
episodes.description: The critics agree: this week's podcast features a "stellar cast" including Supergiant's Greg Kasavin, some fast and furious game-industry chat, and plenty of action news with Destiny, Call of Duty and StarCraft!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 473: I’ve Always Cared About Science

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 472: Weird-Looking Space People

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 471: And Baby Makes Three
episodes.description: We invite Will Smith to the table to help round out the many different ways in which we're enjoying Zelda.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 470: Switch Stance

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 469: Meme Money, Meme Problems

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 467: X-Plane 11 Is...

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 466: SCART Cables for Everyone
episodes.description: Jason's getting destroyed in Injustice 2, Drew's on a new version of X-Plane, Jeff's got things to say about Double Dragon IV, and Peter Brown's cleaning up his video signals in this week's installment of the Giant Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 465: Skeleton Crew
episodes.description: Seasonal illnesses aren't enough to stop us from putting people in front of microphones and talking about video games. One of them is even Resident Evil 7!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 464: Season of the Switch
episodes.description: Nintendo has finally unveiled all the details on their forthcoming portable/console hybrid, Jeff's back from playing it, and Noclip's Danny O'dwyer joins us to talk about it!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2016: Day Five Deliberations
episodes.description: This is it! Our fifth and final day brings with it Overwatch Character of the Year, Best Story, Worst Game, and, of course, Best Game of 2016.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2016: Day Four Deliberations
episodes.description: We're getting down to it on day four, with winners declared for Best Music, Best Multiplayer, Xbox One Backwards-Compatible Game of the Year, and Best Moment or Sequence.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2016: Day Three Deliberations
episodes.description: We're back on the mics and ready to argue about 2016's Best Remaster, Best Fake Computer, Best Surprise, and the always cheery PLEASE STOP.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Game of the Year 2016: Day Two Deliberations

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 07-02-2013

episodes.description: Hot on the heels of Microsoft's Xbox One reveal event, we talk at length about the forthcoming next-gen console battle. Also Star Trek. And spiders. Go Bears!

episodes.description: We burn the midnight oil with GDC 2012, Indie Game: The Movie, Mass Effect 3, Street Fighter X Tekken, I Am Alive, Steele Battalion: Heavy Armor, Fable: The Journey, Halo 4, Trials Evolution, Max Payne 3, and Assassin's Creed III.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Mass Effect 3 Edition

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 02-28-2012
episodes.description: Giant Bomb's own Dave Snider joins us to talk mechs, head tracking, and fools going wild on livestreams.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 02-21-2012

episodes.description: Join us for a laid-back vibe session with Valentine's Day stab wounds, The Darkness II, virtual pinball wish lists, the highs and lows of the Vita launch, Blizzard vs. Valve, and that whole, crazy-ass Double Fine/Kickstarter thing.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 02-07-2012
episodes.description: We deliver insightful coverage of Jedi ghosts, in-depth Super Bowl commercial analysis, the superiority of off-brand Zelda, Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, good stupid vs. bad stupid in Resident Evil, Final Fantasy naming conventions, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 01-31-2012
episodes.description: Ranger Rick's Tumblr, Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, close encounters with Dan Aykroyd, Soul Calibur V, Final Fantasy XIII-2, Resident Evil: Revelations, Jeff's space-garbage-and-murder-slingshot election ticket...yeah. It's a weird week.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 01-24-2012
episodes.description: What do chewy tannins, Chicago sports, warm fronts, makin' cables, Steven Tyler, the Crypt Keeper, SSX, and Resident Evil 6 all have in common? You'll have to listen to this week's episode of the Giant Bombcast to find out!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 01-17-2012
episodes.description: A penny for your thoughts on Skyrim bugs, Star Trek Online, Hitman: Absolution, SOPA, and more.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb's GOTY 2011: Supplemental

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Amalur Edition
episodes.description: Ryan and Brad sit down with Big Huge Games' Ken Rolston and Joe Quadara to discuss Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, dungeon masters, Curt Schilling's fastball, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 01-10-2012
episodes.description: Go green with this week's Giant Bombcast as we welcome Jeff and Patrick back to the show and discuss Star Wars: The Old Republic, Guild Wars, Skyrim, and the great Petaluma pizza drought. There won't be a heart left beating!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 01-03-2012
episodes.description: We ease back into things for the Deuce Dizzy with talk of earthquake preparedness, Game of the Year behind the scenes, townhouse barbecuing, cutting the cable, and, you know, maybe some games!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb's GOTY 2011 Deliberations: Day Five
episodes.description: We finish out our regular categories before facing off in a tense game of Russian roulette as we whittle down Giant Bomb's top 10 games of 2011.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb's GOTY 2011 Deliberations: Day Four
episodes.description: Things turn straight-up Real World ugly as discuss our choices for Best Download-Only Game, Best Co-Op, Best Story, Most Disappointing, and Best Remake/HD Update. WHO WILL GET VOTED OUT OF THE HOUSE???

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb's GOTY 2011 Deliberations: Day Three
episodes.description: Supplies begin to run low and panic sets in as we frantically decide Best Competitive Multiplayer, Best Use of Nolan North, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb's GOTY 2011 Deliberations: Day Two
episodes.description: Things heat up on day two as we choose our winners for Skylander of the Year, Best Debut, Best Surprise, Best Sky Game, and Best Use of a Licensed Song.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Giant Bomb's GOTY 2011 Deliberations: Day One
episodes.description: We kick off our annual verbal knife fight with 2011's 2010 Game of the Year, Best Mission/Level, Best New Character, Dave's Eastern Bloc Game of the Year, and Best Music.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 12-20-2011
episodes.description: Just in time for the holidays, we discuss Skyrim on the PlayStation 3, Trine 2, the Japanese Vita launch, the future of full-motion video, and our first days with Star Wars: The Old Republic. Plus, emails galore!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 12-13-2011
episodes.description: We work out the kinks in Vinny's diabolical plan to clone the Beatles, talk Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning with Brad, reminisce about rap tapes, and generally spend way, way too much time discussing the Spike TV VGAs on this week's Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 12-06-2011
episodes.description: Vinny makes his triumphant return with tales from the suburbs, Patrick cruises Internet chat rooms, Brad catches Black Friday Fever, Ryan hates giant laptops, Jeff craves Texas toast, and everyone plays Saints Row: The Third.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 11-29-2011
episodes.description: Alex Navarro joins us for post-Thanksgiving discussions of Rodian roadies, finding asylum in Raider Nation, hair security, shark punching, the great Zelda switcheroo, Mario Kart 7, tugging' vs. dumpin', Spec Ops: The Line, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 11-22-2011

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 11-15-2011
episodes.description: Nearly three hours of Skyrim, Uncharted 3, Assassin's Creed: Revelations, Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword, Need for Speed: The Run, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 11-08-2011
episodes.description: Get all cozy with a nice, piping-hot 40, and join us for some heated conversation about our experiences with Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3, Saints Row: The Third, RAGE, Uncharted 3: Drake’s Deception, and much more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 11-01-2011
episodes.description: We nurse our fun-size Halloween hangovers with the Bat-man, Rocksmith, Battlefield 3, Uncharted 3, horror movies, and, of course, an inappropriate amount of candy.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 10-25-2011
episodes.description: We make breakthroughs on Brad's crippling Altoids addiction and Jeff's crippling Skylanders addiction, while also covering Batman's ethics, Rocksmith, learning to type the old-fashioned way, Battlefield 3, Uncharted 3, BlizzCon, and more! Je m'appelle Tra

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 10-18-2011

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 10-11-2011
episodes.description: It's Muppets vs. monsters, Wipeout vs. Wipeout, and Forza 4 vs. Trackmania 2 on this week's Giant Bombcast. We also cover the multiple layers of griefing in Dark Souls, Dead Rising canon, bad comic book games, and more. And Brad Shoemaker is here!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 10-04-2011
episodes.description: Ol’ Vinny “Two Pens” Caravella gives us the whole Dark Souls rigmarole, Jeff returns from Vegas with the latest on Syndicate, Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, SSX, and Need for Speed: The Run, and we misinterpret Occam’s Razor in the grossest way po

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 09-27-2011
episodes.description: With Jeff in Vegas, Ryan, Vinny, Patrick, and Brad explore the limits of microphone clipping, Total Recall technology, marathon Gears of War 3 horde sessions, the mystery of From Software, AMC's Breaking Bad featuring Rage from id Software, and the raw, u

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 09-20-2011
episodes.description: Gears of War 3 is out today! So we talk about Gears of War 3. A lot. Turns out, we have no idea what a cog actually is! We're a little more knowledgable about TrackMania 2, Burnout CRASH!, Resident Evil 4, and Renegade Ops, though.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 09-13-2011
episodes.description: We recover from the Second Annual Big Live Live Show: Live! with Infinite Vinnys, technology acronyms for idiots, ManiaPlanet’s insane potential, Johann Sebastian Joust, the new 360 dashboard, The Gunstringer, the dire state of the 3DS, Syndicate, and m

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 09-06-2011
episodes.description: Pickles, Daggerfall, Warhammers, Driver: San Francisco, Dead Island, Resistance 3, Rock of Ages, and, oh, did we mention? The Second Annual Whiskey Media Big Live Live Show Live is happening this Friday!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 08-30-2011
episodes.description: We escape the gravitational pull of the PAX Firefall booth with no shortage of inscrutable inside jokes, as well as some thoughts on Fez, Word Fighter, Charlie Murder, Borderlands 2, Super Monday Night Combat, and much more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 08-16-2011
episodes.description: Jeff returns from his exile of silence to weigh in on the Summer of Disappointment, Patrick scratches an itch, Brad goes free-to-play, and Ryan catches the MOBA bug, plus Steam trading, Creative Suite: Global Offensive, and more in this week’s Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 08-09-2011
episodes.description: It’s natural 20s for everyone as Patrick and Ryan testify about their time with The Witness, Vinny continues to be bewitched by The Witcher, and Brad gets physical with fruit. We also discuss the Borderlands 2 kerfuffle, Pandaren Brewmasters, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 08-02-2011

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 07-26-2011
episodes.description: Email chaos continues to infect the Giant Bombcast as we try and discuss Vinny's tortilla-craft, Jeff's dysfunctional relationship with Catherine, Brad's affection for Starfox's vocal stylings, the fate of Mega Man, From Dust, Demolition Man, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 07-19-2011
episodes.description: Ryan reinvents the remix as we discuss Doom 3, Garcia Hotspur's Pepsi endorsement, socks and pillows, public pools and gas station bathrooms, and, of course, Bastion.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 07-05-2011
episodes.description: The boys recuperate from an amnesia-inducing holiday weekend with Puzzle Agent 2, Galaga Legions DX, thatgamecompany's Journey, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 06-28-2011
episodes.description: We celebrate a special birthday with a 100-foot lava man, wizard beef, controversial pie, the world's worst lapdance, Swery, and everyone's favorite, the United States Supreme Court. It's a party, y'all!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 06-21-2011
episodes.description: The steamiest podcast heats up just in time for summer as we jam on inFamous 2, Origin.com, bad milk and worse steaks, Trenched, fake rumors about blood ninjas, Ocarina of Time, Wii U, stealing Redboxes, and more...girl.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 06-14-2011
episodes.description: As if you didn't get enough Giant Bomb podcasting action last week, this week our E3 2011 PTSD is compounded by the release of Duke Nukem Forever, which, it turns out, is an actual game. Sorta. You know what? You should probably just listen.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast E3 2011 Day Three
episodes.description: No one man should have all this podcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast E3 2011 Day Two
episodes.description: By jove! What an extraordinarily long podcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast E3 2011 Day One
episodes.description: Mega64. Naughty Dog. Double Fine. David Jaffe. Rich Gallup. Four hours and twenty four minutes of the rawest, realest developer conversation you will ever hear.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast E3 2011 Day Zero
episodes.description: We welcome several special guests--including Braid creator Jonathan Blow, e & Stepto from Xbox, and Gary Whitta--while also covering the Microsoft, EA, Ubisoft, and Sony press conferences.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 05-31-2011
episodes.description: It's our last regularly scheduled Bombcast before the crew ships off to Los Angeles for E3! We cover men's haircuts, L.A. Noire, Call of Duty Elite, StarCraft II: Heart of the Swarm, PlayStation Vita, and, of course, E3.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast Pre-E3 2011 Edition
episodes.description: Special guest Michael "Pach-Man" Pachter joins Ryan, Jeff, and Patrick for this pre-E3 Bombcast full of predictions, hopes, fears, and more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 05-24-2011
episodes.description: Brad messes around with his Windows Phone 7 phone, Jeff waxes rhapsodic about BioShock Infinite, Vinny buries himself in Witcher backlog, Ryan goes to a parade, and everyone stresses hard on E3 in this week's Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 05-17-2011
episodes.description: It's brown apples for everyone as we discuss the finer points of mustaches, sailboat brunches, the rich tradition of running through the park drunk and naked, and more. We also spend way, way too much time discussing Rockstar's latest, L.A. Noire.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 05-10-2011
episodes.description: We build a scatological birdhouse in this week's Bombcast, discussing Lorne Michaels' royalties, Sony's E3 press conference, the burden of fruit trees, the controversial popcorn issue, foot food, and, of course, lobthtuh monthtuth.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 05-03-2011
episodes.description: We re-open old Fable III wounds, get serious about Mortal Kombat fiction, spend an inordinate amount of time figuring out how to bring pizza to space, try and make sense of Jet's publishing/foreign language business, and more in this week's Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 04-26-2011
episodes.description: Brad returns from Mexico with magical tales of free pool bars, Ryan dares Vinny to stop playing Dragon Age II, and Patrick helps us digest what has been an action-packed week in news in this week's edition of the Giant Bombcast!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 04-19-2011
episodes.description: We get messy with Grandma's Cookies as the conversation leans towards less tawdry fare, like Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes, Bethesda's open-world first-person shooter factory, vendor trash, Wii HD, and--surprise surprise--Mortal Kombat and Portal 2.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 04-11-2011
episodes.description: Jeff, Vinny, and Dave take to the microphones to discuss the stupidity of kayaking, Capcom's recent announcements, that Persona 4 anime, and more.

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 04-05-2011
episodes.description: Brad returns from his self-imposed exile, and we dazzle him--Rip-Van-Winkle-style--with tales of Mega Man Universe, the cancellation of The Agency, the rise and fall and re-rise of Majesco, GameStop going digital, Stardock confusion, and much more!

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 03-29-2011

episodes.title: Giant Bombcast 03-22-2011
